```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
require(ggplot2)
require(reshape2)
```

# Holis

```{r}
CPU <- read.csv("999CPU.csv")
GPU <- read.csv("999GPU.100.csv")
m <- merge(CPU,GPU)
colnames(m) <- c("Pixels","CPU","GPU")

EscandiMorning <- melt(m, id.vars = "Pixels")

ggplot(EscandiMorning, aes(Pixels, value, color = variable)) +
  geom_line() +
  ylab("Time") +
  theme(legend.title=element_blank())

speedup <- data.frame(Pixels = m$Pixels,
                      SpeedUp = m$CPU / m$GPU)

ggplot(speedup, aes(Pixels, SpeedUp)) +
  geom_line()
```
